citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:55 pm-3:25
pm on 12/09/2015.
The inspector knocked on the house door and honked the car horn with no response. Left a message on the
phone.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:55 pm-3:25
pm on 12/09/2015.
The inspector knocked on the house door and honked the car horn with no response.  Left a message on the
phone.
